# source_dir

**Instance Property**

The source directory to look up.

## Declaration

```swift
var source_dir: UnsafeMutablePointer<es_file_t>
```

## Inspecting Event Properties

- **relative_target**: The filename to look up.
- **reserved**: An unused field reserved for future use.

items.description: An unused field reserved for future use.
